content: AutoStream Basic Plan costs $29 per month and includes 10 videos per month with 720p resolution. This plan does not include 24/7 support.
AutoStream Pro Plan costs $79 per month and includes unlimited videos, 4K resolution, and AI captions.
24/7 customer support is available only for AutoStream Pro plan users.
AutoStream does not offer refunds after 7 days from purchase.
AutoStream is an automated video editing SaaS tool for content creators.
AutoStream works with YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, and other video platforms.
